name: WOF - a dogs game
description:
This is the only version of pong you will EVER need!
Compete against a friend, or against yourself if you have none!
ESPORTS ready!

ALL HAIL WOF!

WOF

PS it is moddable: you can add your own dogs and frisbees! just look at res folder and cfg folder and try it out.

CONTROLS

up key/down key: control right dog, navigate UI
z/s: control left dog
enter: UI accept
left key/right key: change setting in settings menu

Written in C++ using SFML
Source code available at: https://github.com/FreekDS/Wof
might contain bugs
